posts.post_title: T206 ++ Old Mill ++ Reagan++ SGC 70/EX+/5.5 + ONLY 2 higher
posts.post_content:
T206 ++ Old Mill ++ Reagan ++ Southern League ++ SGC 70/EX+/5.5 + ONLY 2 higher

Well, I just sold a Reagan SGC 70 on ebay yesterday for $255:

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/T206-Old-Mill-Reagan-Southern-League-SGC-70-EX-5-5-ONLY-2-higher-/111417313825#ht_1178wt_908[/url]


Oddly enough :rolleyes: I have another Reagan SGC 70.

Instead of going back and forth with ebay under bidders, I decided to put this new card up on BST.


SOLD


***** Flecks behind head, shoulder, and above belt are on scan not card.


Free s/h.  Any form of payment.

email preferred over PM:  [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=155410&d=1407182782[/IMG]

Email sent, Scott. I'll take it - thank you.
